mapper.select: SELECT a.active_id, a.u_id, a.active_type, a.active_title, a.content, a.viewed_count, a.liked, a.update_time FROM active a WHERE a.u_id = #{uid} OR active_id IN ( ( SELECT active_id FROM active_and_club WHERE from_club_id IN ( SELECT club_id FROM club_member WHERE user_id = #{uid} ))) ORDER BY a.update_time DESC

SELECT a.active_id, a.active_type, a.u_id, a.active_title, a.content, b.u_name, b.u_profile_photo_name, b.u_profile_backgroundimg_name, a.update_time, a.liked, a.viewed_count FROM user b, ( SELECT a.active_id, a.u_id, a.active_type, a.active_title, a.content, a.viewed_count, a.liked, a.update_time FROM active a WHERE a.u_id = #{uid} OR active_id IN ( ( SELECT active_id FROM active_and_club WHERE from_club_id IN ( SELECT club_id FROM club_member WHERE user_id = #{uid} )))) a WHERE b.u_id = a.u_id ORDER BY a.update_time desc

SELECT active_id, active_type, active_title, content, b.u_id, b.u_name, b.u_profile_photo_name, b.u_profile_backgroundimg_name, update_time, a.liked, a.viewed_count FROM ( SELECT active_id, active_type, active_title, content, update_time, liked, viewed_count, u_id FROM active WHERE u_id = #{uid} ) a LEFT JOIN user b ON a.u_id = b.u_id ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT active_id, active_type, active_title, content, b.u_id, b.u_name, b.u_profile_photo_name, b.u_profile_backgroundimg_name, like_time as update_time, a.liked, a.viewed_count FROM ( SELECT active_id, active_type, active_title, content, like_time, liked, viewed_count, a.u_id FROM active a LEFT JOIN (SELECT like_active_id,like_time,u_id FROM liked_record) b on active_id=like_active_id WHERE b.u_id = #{uid} AND active_type = 50 AND like_time !='' ) a LEFT JOIN user b ON a.u_id = b.u_id ORDER BY update_time DESC
select date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count(*) count from active group by date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d') HAVING date =#{time}

SELECT active_id, case when active_type=40 then '文章' when active_type=50 then '动态' end as a_type, a.u_id, u.u_name, update_time from active a LEFT JOIN user u on a.u_id=u.u_id ORDER BY update_time desc

SELECT active_id, case when active_type=40 then '文章' when active_type=50 then '动态' end as a_type, a.u_id, u.u_name, update_time from active a LEFT JOIN user u on a.u_id=u.u_id where a.u_id=#{clubId} ORDER BY update_time desc
